price: 29. Dheh: Haddaad qarisaan waxa ku jira laabahiinna ama muujisaan, Alle wuu ogsoon yahay, wuxuuna ogsoon yahay waxa ku sugan samooyinka iyo waxa ku sugan arlada. Allena wax walba wuu Karaa.
arabic: قُلۡ إِن تُخۡفُواْ مَا فِي صُدُورِكُمۡ أَوۡ تُبۡدُوهُ يَعۡلَمۡهُ ٱللَّهُۗ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul in tukh'fū mā fī ṣudūrikum aw tub'dūhu yaʿlamhu al-lahu wayaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
